messages.record_new: {#server}>> {#record}You secured your {#highlite}{1}{#record}. place with a time of {#highlite}{2}{#record}!
messages.record_first: {#server}>> {#highlite}{1}{#record} took the {#highlite}{3}{#record}. World Record with a time of {#highlite}{2}{#record}!
messages.record_new_pub: {#server}>> {#highlite}{1}{#record} secured his {#highlite}{2}{#record}. place with a time of {#highlite}{3}{#record}!
messages.record_new_priv: {#server}>> {#record}You took the {#highlite}{1}{#record}. World Record with a time of {#highlite}{2}{#record}!
